content: Hello! It seems you're working on cybersecurity assessments and pentesting. How can I assist you today with your plans for scanning or testing the website lms.hust.edu.vn, especially concerning phishing and malware related to PowerShell execution (T1059.001) and initial access through phishing emails (T1566)?
Can you analyze if i get a malicious link in email and click on that. Then my computer being hacked and what's the mitre technique being used here
No relevant MITRE ATT&CK techniques were identified or verified for the given scenario.
